inclusion.criterion: History of histologically documented MM with relapsed or progressive disease after
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: either scheduled tandem or one autologous transplantation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has measurable disease in which to capture response.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performance status of 2 as per Zubroid scale, unless PS of 3-4 based solely on bone pain.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a platelet count 75,000/μL,
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: and an ANC of at least 1,000/μL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate renal function defined as serum creatinine < 2.5 mg/dL.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate hepatic function defined as serum transaminases and direct bilirubin < 2 x the upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Male or female adults of at least 18 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have signed an IRB-approved written informed consent form and demonstrate willingness to meet follow-up schedule and study procedure obligations.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chemotherapy or radiotherapy received within the previous 2 weeks.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Significant neurotoxicity, defined as grade > 2 neurotoxicity per NCI Common Toxicity Criteria (See Appendix).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant hepatic dysfunction as noted by bilirubin or AST > 3 times the upper normal limit or clinically significant concurrent hepatitis.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: New York Hospital Association (NYHA) Class III or Class IV heart failure.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction within the last 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled, active infection requiring IV antibiotics.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of multiple myeloma with relapsed disease after autologous transplantation and measurable disease. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and has systemic amyloidosis involving lungs, tongue, bladder, and heart.
